meanings.sent1: She was entreating her friend to help her with the homework.
meanings.sent2: The child was entreating his parents for a new toy.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was entreating for more treats with its adorable puppy eyes.
meanings.sent4: The flowers were entreating the sun to come out and shine on them.
meanings.sent5: The student was entreating the teacher for extra credit to improve their grade.

meanings.definition: To make an earnest request or petition for
meanings.sent1: He was entreating the council for permission to hold a charity event.
meanings.sent2: The villagers were entreating the king for help during the famine.
meanings.sent3: The cat was entreating for more food by meowing loudly near its empty bowl.
meanings.sent4: The birds were entreating the sky for rain to quench their thirst.
meanings.sent5: The hiker was entreating the park ranger for directions to the nearest campsite.
